items.noInformation:

items.erroremCogitatorum:
Cogitator System Overload!
Supernormal data influx on:
items.Help_Description_1: The information about the attributes used in the strategy game “Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War – Soulstorm” is located on this resource.
items.Help_Description_2: You can suggest corrections at Issues GitHub page.
items.Help_Description_5: For suggest improves you can tell it to Ideas Discussion.
items.Help_Description_6: And at Discussion created for your requests about own materials your can send the adding request of this to the knowledge base.
items.Help_Description_3: In the background, there is a depiction of a scene from the “Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine (2011)” game.
items.ebp_ui_ext_description: Stores information primarily displayed for the entity on the game interface: icon, name, display as “hero”, tooltip-descriptions, and more, as well as a hotkey.
items.ebp_ui_info: stores common info for the interface.
items.ebp_help_text_list: list of localization codes for auxiliary text.
items.ebp_help_text_num: from 01 to 08 (default), localization code in the format $000 (number from .ucs file).
items.ebp_icon_name: the path to the entity icon is in the format 'folder\icon_name' (stored at the path data\art\ui\ingame\folder\icon_name.tga).
